suewije wrote:

> Hi, I had a couple of questions about the requirements for running
> Junit.

> 1) Does jUnit support the testing of a java applet comprised of
> Swing and AWT components, which clients access using webstart?

Yes.

> 2) Also, is there a website to find out about any
> limitations/requirements for running Junit ? (i.e. what criteria my
> applications must fulfill).

No, because it's not necessary. If your code has a Java client (or in 
particular, if it's written entirely in Java), then you can using JUnit 
to test it. How /effectively/ you do it is the tricky part, and the 
subject of several books.
